data.name: BRINK Traveler
data.detailed_description:
Important note:
  • Oculus, Index, G2 and HTC Vive users: make sure SteamVR is your active OpenXR runtime in SteamVR > Settings > Developer
  • Vive Cosmos users: make sure to launch Viveport Console and select Yes when asked about OpenXR.
--------------------------------------

BRINK Traveler is a virtual travel experience that takes you to amazing natural locations in full 3D to feel like you're really there. Step into a postcard and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today!

Featuring:
  • 20 incredible spots to see across 13 locations
  • A virtual guide to teach you about your surroundings
  • Collect points of interest
  • Shoot photos
  • Download only the locations you wish to see
  • Regular content updates with more locations to come

Current locations:
Horseshoe Bend, White Pocket, Mount Morrison, Mount Whitney, Alabama Hills, The Wave, Arches National Park, Death Valley National Park (North & South), Antelope Canyon, Crystal Crag, Haifoss Iceland, and more locations coming soon.

BRINK XR is a proud member of 1% for the Planet. We donate a minimum of 1% of our total annual sales to organizations focused on environmental protection initiatives to ensure the wonderful natural places of the World are preserved for future generations.

data.short_description: BRINK Traveler is a virtual travel experience that takes you to amazing natural locations in full 3D to feel like you're really there. Step into a postcard and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
